p: The patient’s lumbar puncture studies demonstrated pertinent findings of a white blood cell (WBC) count of 592, lymphocytes of 83%, neutrophils of 15%, monocytes of 2%, red blood cell (RBC) count of 0, and no sign of xanthochromia. cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) protein was 163 mg/dL and glucose level was 56 mg/dL. The data were consistent with viral meningitis with pending viral serology.
